languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс внимательно смотрит на говорящего, затем переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Вокс-передачи, исполненные скверны... особый вид ереси, требующий познаний в нечистых искусствах. Кьява Гамма могла подпасть под влияние искаженных {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецов{/g} — раз предавшись скверне, они забывают об ограничениях, налагаемых верой, и предаются безудержным и опасным изысканиям"

{n}Heinrix looks at the man closely, then at you.{/n} "Corrupted vox-casts... A special breed of heresy that requires knowledge of unholy arts. Kiava Gamma could have fallen under the influence of twisted {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} — having once succumbed to corruption, they forget all limitations imposed by faith and delve into unbridled and dangerous research."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс внимательно смотрит на говорящего, затем переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Вокс-передачи, исполненные скверны... особый вид ереси, требующий познаний в нечистых искусствах. Кьява Гамма могла подпасть под влияние искаженных {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецов{/g} — раз предавшись скверне, они забывают об ограничениях, налагаемых верой, и предаются безудержным и опасным изысканиям"

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは男をジッと見つめてからこちらを見た。{/n}「腐敗したヴォクスキャスト…穢れた術の知識を必要とする特殊な異端だな。キアヴァ・ガンマは堕落した{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の手に落ちたのかもしれん。一度腐敗した者は、信仰によって課されたあらゆる制限を忘れ、奔放で危険な研究に没頭するものだからな」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at the man closely, then at you.{/n} "Corrupted vox-casts... A special breed of heresy that requires knowledge of unholy arts. Kiava Gamma could have fallen under the influence of twisted {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} — having once succumbed to corruption, they forget all limitations imposed by faith and delve into unbridled and dangerous research."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは男をジッと見つめてからこちらを見た。{/n}「腐敗したヴォクスキャスト…穢れた術の知識を必要とする特殊な異端だな。キアヴァ・ガンマは堕落した{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の手に落ちたのかもしれん。一度腐敗した者は、信仰によって課されたあらゆる制限を忘れ、奔放で危険な研究に没頭するものだからな」

languages.text: {n}海因里希仔细观察着那个人，然后看向你。{/n}“是被腐化的音阵通讯……那是特殊的异端形式，需要邪恶技术的相关的知识。基亚瓦伽马星很可能落入了被腐化的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}的手中。那些技术神甫一旦投靠腐化的力量，就会把信仰加诸的所有限制抛至脑后，全身心投入毫无节制、极其危险的研究之中。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at the man closely, then at you.{/n} "Corrupted vox-casts... A special breed of heresy that requires knowledge of unholy arts. Kiava Gamma could have fallen under the influence of twisted {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} — having once succumbed to corruption, they forget all limitations imposed by faith and delve into unbridled and dangerous research."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希仔细观察着那个人，然后看向你。{/n}“是被腐化的音阵通讯……那是特殊的异端形式，需要邪恶技术的相关的知识。基亚瓦伽马星很可能落入了被腐化的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}的手中。那些技术祭司一旦投靠腐化的力量，就会把信仰加诸的所有限制抛至脑后，全身心投入毫无节制、极其危险的研究之中。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix mira detenidamente al hombre y luego a ti.{/n} «Han corrompido las transmisiones de voco... Esa forma especial de herejía requiere un profundo saber de las artes impías. Es posible que Kiava Gamma haya caído en la influencia de {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} con malas intenciones. Una vez que sucumben a la corrupción, olvidan las limitaciones que les impone su fe y se adentran en una investigación desenfrenada y peligrosa».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at the man closely, then at you.{/n} "Corrupted vox-casts... A special breed of heresy that requires knowledge of unholy arts. Kiava Gamma could have fallen under the influence of twisted {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} — having once succumbed to corruption, they forget all limitations imposed by faith and delve into unbridled and dangerous research."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix mira detenidamente al hombre y luego a ti.{/n} «Han corrompido las transmisiones de voco... Esa forma especial de herejía requiere un profundo saber de las artes impías. Es posible que Kiava Gamma haya caído en la influencia de {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} con malas intenciones. Una vez que sucumben a la corrupción, olvidan las limitaciones que les impone su fe y se adentran en una investigación desenfrenada y peligrosa».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix observe l'homme attentivement, puis se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Des transmissions-vox corrompues... Un type spécial d'hérésie qui requiert une connaissance des arts impies. Kiava Gamma s'est peut-être retrouvée sous l'emprise de {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} dépravés : ayant succombé au vice, ils oublient les restrictions imposées par la foi et s'adonnent à de dangereuses recherches. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at the man closely, then at you.{/n} "Corrupted vox-casts... A special breed of heresy that requires knowledge of unholy arts. Kiava Gamma could have fallen under the influence of twisted {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} — having once succumbed to corruption, they forget all limitations imposed by faith and delve into unbridled and dangerous research."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix observe l'homme attentivement, puis se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Des transmissions-vox corrompues... Un type spécial d'hérésie qui requiert une connaissance des arts impies. Kiava Gamma s'est peut-être retrouvée sous l'emprise de {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} dépravés : ayant succombé au vice, ils oublient les restrictions imposées par la foi et s'adonnent à de dangereuses recherches. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix betrachtet den Mann genau und sieht dann dich an.{/n} "Verderbte Vox-Übertragungen ... Eine besondere Art der Ketzerei, die Kenntnisse der unheiligen Künste erfordert. Kiava Gamma könnte unter den Einfluss böser {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} geraten sein – einmal der Verderbnis erlegen, vergessen sie alle Schranken des Glaubens und stürzen sich ungebremst in gefährliche Forschungen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at the man closely, then at you.{/n} "Corrupted vox-casts... A special breed of heresy that requires knowledge of unholy arts. Kiava Gamma could have fallen under the influence of twisted {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} — having once succumbed to corruption, they forget all limitations imposed by faith and delve into unbridled and dangerous research."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix betrachtet den Mann genau und sieht dann dich an.{/n} "Verderbte Vox-Übertragungen ... Eine besondere Art der Ketzerei, die Kenntnisse der unheiligen Künste erfordert. Kiava Gamma könnte unter den Einfluss böser {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} geraten sein – einmal der Verderbnis erlegen, vergessen sie alle Schranken des Glaubens und stürzen sich ungebremst in gefährliche Forschungen."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix adama yakından şöyle bir bakıp ardından sana dönüyor.{/n} "Bozuk voks yayınları... Uğursuz sanat bilgisi gerektiren özel bir kâfirlik türüdür. Kiava Gama, çarpık {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahiplerin{/g} etkisi altına girmiş olabilir. Bir kez yozlaşmaya boyun eğdiklerinde, inancın koyduğu tüm sınırlamaları unutup dizginlenemeyen ve tehlikeli bir arayışa girerler."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at the man closely, then at you.{/n} "Corrupted vox-casts... A special breed of heresy that requires knowledge of unholy arts. Kiava Gamma could have fallen under the influence of twisted {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} — having once succumbed to corruption, they forget all limitations imposed by faith and delve into unbridled and dangerous research."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix adama yakından şöyle bir bakıyor ve ardından sana dönüyor.{/n} "Bozuk voks yayınları... Uğursuz sanat bilgisi gerektiren özel bir kâfirlik türüdür. Kiava Gama, çarpık {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahiplerin{/g} etkisi altına girmiş olabilir. Bir kez yozlaşmaya boyun eğdiklerinde, inancın koyduğu tüm sınırlamaları unutup dizginlenemeyen ve tehlikeli bir arayışa girerler."
